price: Dájúdájú àwọn tí kò retí ìpàdé Wa (ní ọ̀run), tí wọ́n yọ́nú sí ìṣẹ̀mí ayé, tí ọkàn wọn sì balẹ̀ dódó sí (ìṣẹ̀mí ayé yìí) àti àwọn afọ́nú-fọ́ra nípa àwọn āyah Wa,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱطۡمَأَنُّواْ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yarjūna liqāanā waraḍū bil-ḥayati al-dun'yā wa-iṭ'ma-annū bihā wa-alladhīna hum ʿan āyātinā ghāfilūna
